headline.main: CHINA JOINS BLOC UNDER LEASE-LEND; T.V. Soong Signs Pact Insuring Aid and Post-War Role In World Economic Talks BRITISH MODEL FOLLOWED White House Indicates That Other Agreements Impend -- Awaits Soviet Reply

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 2 -- China was brought into the structure of United States-British lease-lend arrangements today through her adherence to the master lease-lend agreement previously concluded with Great Britain.
abstract: Sec Hull and Chinese Min Soong sign pact assuring China's role in post-war econ readjustment; illus
snippet: WASHINGTON, June 2 -- China was brought into the structure of United States-British lease-lend arrangements today through her adherence to the master lease-lend agreement previously concluded with Great Britain....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
